headline: Zoë Harris,  Simon Lazarre-Bloom
abstract: The bride spotted the groom at a party in 2015, but they didn’t connect until a year later, through Facebook.
lead_paragraph: Zoë Kimberly Harris and Simon Lazarre-Bloom were married Dec. 30 at San Francisco City Hall. Douglas H. White, a New York City deputy fire commissioner and the groom’s uncle, officiated, having become a Universal Life minister for this event.
